thread.title: In Case You Didn't Notice, 'The Beatles' Is a Pun
thread.title_full: In Case You Didn't Notice, 'The Beatles' Is a Pun

title: In Case You Didn't Notice, 'The Beatles' Is a Pun
text:
In Case You Didn't Notice, 'The Beatles' Is a Pun 
This guy made a video for the people who didn't . Most Popular By Sammy Nickalls Mar 2, 2017 There are two groups of people in the world: Those who know 'The Beatles' is a pun, and those who do not. (OK, I'll pause a moment so the latter can absorb that revelation, and the former can inevitably gloat about how they already knew that . We get it, you're sooo smart.) Anyway, BuzzFeed 's Jesse McLaren seems to be firmly in camp Didn't Know That, and his viral video is pretty glorious. That moment you realize "The Beatles" is a pun. pic.twitter.com/O7PhM4TtzP 
â€” Jesse McLaren (@McJesse) March 1, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
